adjectives.description: animalian (comparative more animalian, superlative most animalian)

entries.meaning: (sciences) Of the kingdom Animalia, which includes humans.
(broadly) Of an animal or animals, usually including humans but sometimes connoting nonhuman nature.
examples: We stood before the Lord in the high-backed chair, and I saw that the wood figures of his regal throne were, of course, animalian, feline and diabolical.

entries.meaning: (loosely, rare) Like that of an animal or animals, usually including humans but sometimes connoting nonhuman nature.
